faqItems.question: Can I upgrade my subscription?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Upgrading your subscription plan with Slate is a breeze. Simply log into your account and navigate to the billing section.

faqItems.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faqItems.answer: Of course! We believe in offering flexibility to our valued customers. If you decide to cancel your subscription with Slate, you can do so anytime from your account settings.

faqItems.question: Does Slate offer a free trial period?
faqItems.answer: Yes, indeed! We understand that getting started with a new SaaS platform can be overwhelming. That's why Slate offers a free trial period for you to explore its features before committing.
